ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker

Class ClaimController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.ClaimController

  • public class ClaimController
extends java.lang.Object
    The Claim Controller class is used for making changes to a Claim that is supplied to the controller. You should not be making changes to a claim object directly but through this controller.
    Author:
    Team3ScandalouStopwatch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClaimController(Claim currentClaim)
      Constructor that allows the ClaimController to edit the details of the claim that is passed to it.
